column4: hey all.  anyone running 9.04 with virtual box, newest one out ????? could use some much needed help

so i have set the shared folder, added it in virtualbox, but cant get it to show up in xp when vbox is runng
- did you install also vbox addons?
vobx addons?  not sure actually, how should i go about installing that??
- on the main menu o virtualbox

hmm, looking for that drop down menu, and checking, but no option for it.  there is a shared folders section.  in there i added the folder that i would like to be shared.  is this what you refering too??
- no on the main menu of virtual box you have an option to install addons
sorry for the trouble, but i dont see it anywhere.  and when i mosu over the folder i am trying to share, in shared folder options, it says i need guest additions??
ahhhhh when its running... argh. missed that.  lol, ok lets see here...
ok, did that, came up with errors. ie, display, and second was something else, i think mouse, but its restarting now
- ok, i think now it should work
AWWWWWWW SWEET MAN!!!! i can custom the size... omg, i WISH i knew about these addons AGES ago.  SOOO useful!!!! ^_^
hmm... so where is the shared files?  sorry its been a LONG time since windows.  lol.
actually, i have  lost the ability to be fully in the os now.  but its ok.  secondly though, where is the shared  folder location?
